metadata.name: Register new Logon Process by Rubeus
metadata.comment: Detects potential use of Rubeus via registered new trusted logon process

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM authentication WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (metadata.event_code = 4611 AND lower(actor.process.name) = lower('user32logonprocesss'))

output.summary: Detects potential use of Rubeus via registered new trusted logon process
